c74object.name: crucible
c74object.digest: Parses a stream of messages from the buildspans object.
c74object.description: The `crucible` object is designed to parse the output stream from the third outlet of the `buildspans` object. It listens for messages with selectors in the format `track::bar::key` and extracts specific values to send to its outlets.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When set to 1, a rightmost outlet is created for verbose logging messages, which can be helpful for debugging.

inlet.name: in
inlet.digest: Input for the message stream from buildspans.
inlet.description: The main inlet for receiving messages to trigger the object's parsing functionality.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs the value associated with the `palette` key from an incoming message.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: When a message with a `span` key is received, this outlet outputs the `bar` part of the selector as an integer.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs the largest integer value found in the arguments of a message with a `span` key.
